IniReader Class

Defined in: index.js:7
Module: IniReader

Constructs either a IniReaderCore or a IniReaderInheritDefault class depends on the inheritDefault configuration property.

Constructor

IniReader

(
  • cfg
)

Defined in index.js:7

Parameters:

  • cfg Object
    • [inheritDefault] Boolean optional

      If true it will construct a IniReaderInheritDefault class, if false a IniReaderCore

    • [async] Boolean optional

      If true, it will use asynchronous calls to read and write files

    • [file] String optional

      The file name to read or write during operations

  • Index

Item Index
